Hello

formatted contents

  • This contents is written in Markdown, while the layout is described in HTML and CSS,

  • with parameters defined in the front matter area.
    e.g. the page.num constant value defined in the front matter area is 256.

raw contents look like:


---
title: "this is the top page"
num: 256
layout: default-md
---

# Hello

- This contents is written in Markdown, while the layout is described in HTML and CSS,

- with parameters defined in the front matter area.  
  e.g. the `page.num` constant value defined in the front matter area is {{ page.num }}.
